name: Linode
overview:
Linode offers cloud hosting services to individuals and businesses around the world - serving more than 40,000 customers from five facilities across the U.S. and Europe. The company provides customers with 24/7 live support and tools that make it easy to create and deploy servers on demand.

Linode is a global cloud hosting provider that has been offering individuals and companies of all sizes virtualized “servers on demand” since 2003. The company makes it easy for customers to quickly select their plan, Linux distribution, and facility, and have one or more servers up and running in minutes. From there customers can dynamically scale to meet their demands, paying only for what they use with no long-term commitments.

Linode delivers cloud services from five data centers across the U.S. and Europe to some of the most innovative companies in the world, such as The Onion and Creative Commons.
